Author: Flint#6435
Content: Someone asked above about projects that have paying customers, I call the first thing that came to mind is the Tierion (TNT) project and you can continue the list for a long time! If we have one hope of using AtomicDEX then this is not good! The project will grow only with the participation of major players! Where will the venture capital investments be? Who will explain why one of the many venture companies should invest in KMD? What is the incentive when an open source project, despite such innovations, goes unnoticed and does not attract big money even at the lowest price? The trading volumes indicate that the coin is not interesting now to absolutely no big, not small investors, and without investors, even the coolest project is doomed - it is simply copied by enterprising Chinese. - they will register in the jurisdiction of Singapore and conduct such marketing that everyone will forget KMD with the words: "why do we need KMD if there is a "..... chain"  that has all komodo chips but also marketing like Tron and deflation like BNB which is all they accuse them of centralization but forget that they are developing their own DEX in which integrating atomic permutations and all sorts of Antara analogs is not a problem! Maybe the team might think about creating a similarity of DeFi, Maker and the like inside the chain? for a wide range of investors, the Chinese conc annuities will take the best and leave us overboard - after all, the same original idea with confidential ones failed and the ARRR chain is dead in fact now because whoever looks at it while there are Monero, ZEN, ZEC and simple bitcoin mixers! Thatâ€™s left at the end of BTC and a few Chinese projects that have a lot of money not only to hire the best developers in the world but also to conduct top-level marketing!

Content: 1) Tierion, raised 10x what komodo raised,  and is 30 lower on CMC, i wonder if people complain as much to them as us?   2) Atomicdex isnt the only thing being relied on.  3)  We currently are the only advanced technology partner in blockchain on AWS, and are working towards the same on other major platforms  4)  If people could just copy us and make a more successful project, why havent they,   we encourage people to create their own fork of Komodo,  the whole point behind smartchains.  5)  #cc-pegs  is the Maker-like  thing you are requesting. 6)  ARRR is not dead,   lite clients are being tested and atomic swap compatibility with ARRR as well.
